Name: New York
Description: The largest city in the United States, known for its skyline, culture, and global influence.

Name: Los Angeles
Description: A major coastal city in California known for entertainment, beaches, and Hollywood.

Name: Toronto
Description: Canada’s largest city and a major multicultural hub.

Name: Vancouver
Description: A coastal Canadian city known for nature, mountains, and modern lifestyle.

Name: London
Description: The capital of the UK, known for history, architecture, and global influence.

Name: Manchester
Description: A major UK city known for music, football, and industrial heritage.

Name: Berlin
Description: Germany’s capital, known for innovation, history, and culture.

Name: Munich
Description: A lively German city famous for technology, beer culture, and Bavarian heritage.

Name: Paris
Description: The French capital known for art, fashion, cuisine, and romance.

Name: Lyon
Description: A French city known for gastronomy and historical architecture.

Name: Kyiv
Description: The capital of Ukraine with deep history, culture, and modern development.

Name: Lviv
Description: A cultural center of Ukraine known for its old town and European charm.
